⚇ BATHROOM STUDIES ⚇

Location: REVEALED ON DAY

Date: MULTIPLE - REVEALED SHORTLY BEFORE

I'll be performing spontanous happenings in bathrooms in and outside of London as part of bathrooms (study).


⚇ LCLO SPRING CYCLES CONCERT ⚇

Location: SECRET

Date: June

Alongside the London Community Laptop Orchestra I'll be performing some new work in their Spring Cycles (⚘↻) concert. More information on this to be revealed soon!


⚇ NEW MUSIC BIENNIAL ⚇

Location: Southbank Centre

Date: Sunday 6th June

I'll be performing MARCH by Uri Agnon as part of the CoMA choir.


⚇ PECKHAM CHAMBER ORCHESTRA SUMMER CONCERT ⚇

Location: Copeland Park, 133 Copeland Rd, London SE15 3SN

Date: TBC

I'm joining the Peckham Chamber Orchestra for another term, both conducting and working with the artist Benji Jeffrey on something exciting. More info soon!




__________

ARCHIVE STARTING 03.25


⚇ MORE ROAR! LAUNCH PARTY ⚇

Location: Avalon Cafe, SE14 5RW

Date: Thursday 15th May

I'll be playing a short set with Agnes Cameron at the MORE ROAR! synthesiser launch party. I've been composing with it a bunch recently so very excited to get a look into how other artists have been approaching it!


⚇ RINGTONE WORKSHOP ⚇

Location: Arebyte Bethnal Green, 62 Roman Road, E2 0PG

Date: Tuesday 20th May

I am running a workshop as part of the London Community Laptop Orchestra looking at the art of ringtone composition. This is in aid of a collaboration with artist Benji Jeffrey on a new piece for the Peckham Chamber Orchestra's Summer Concert.
